content.rendered:
Thriving in New Zealand’s optimal climate, our cymbidium orchid stems produce exceptionally large florals. Their presence effortlessly infuses any space with refined beauty. Impressive, bold, a true statement piece!

Simply presented en masse, with no additional foliage added. Finished in our signature wrap and trailing ribbon OR with the option to add a contemporary ‘Marmoset Found’ vase.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The cymbidium orchid flowers you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
